function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Monitoring dry cough for COVID-19 detection and prevention.","Impact":"Unmonitored coughs can lead to undetected spread of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Implement real-time cough monitoring and early detection systems.","Technologies":"Audio or mechanical sensors, wearable stethoscope patches, signal processing, ML classification algorithms.","People":"People at risk of COVID-19 infection, healthcare workers, general public.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health organizations, technology developers."}]}
